General.Name: Shaanxi Coal Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Coal Industry Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, mines, produces, washes, processes, and sells coal in China and internationally. The company explores for power and chemical. Its coal properties are primarily located in Northern Shaanxi and Binhuang. It markets its products under the Huangling, Huangling No.1, Yuhua, Hongliulin, and other brand names. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Xi'an, China. Shaanxi Coal Industry Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Industry Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Indu. Grp Bldg, Xi'an, China, 710077
